Welcome to LoudFeed WP Hosting

Posted on October 4, 2011 by drron

We are offering help to the NYC General Assembly Internet Working Group. This is a multisite installation of WordPress that allows the creation of subdomains to enable the easy support and maintenance of multiple sites.

Come to the Internet Working Group meetings to find out how you can join and become an active participant.

This entry was posted in News and tagged join by drron. Bookmark the permalink.
